resources.string: This app was a group effort contributed by Matthew Ondak, Jacob Patton, Aaron Saderholm, and Abraham Kali. It was developed in an Android Apps course at Berea College. The Berea Helpkit is an assortment of Apps to help students, faculty, alumni, and visitors. We welcome improvements on the app and hope for it to become an helpful tool for Berea College life. The app is an open source app licensed under the Apache License Version 2.0.

Selecting Apps
To select an app simple press on the icon. Make sure to press the menu button if you are running a lower version of Android to see menu options.
